attributes.additional_details: Want a more stable economy so our prices don't keep rising. How about paying 120 Million off our debt each year in one simple quick process? There are currently 60 Million people within great Britain - if every member of our great nation paid £2 each a year not a month or day but per year such an insignificant amount could make such a big difference not to the government as a whole but to all of our 'middle' or 'lower' class lives! If we can afford it twice a year? I know nobody likes the idea of a 'TAX' but let’s face it, this country needs saving and were the ones who need it saving. We can't keep blaming the past we need to resource for our future.
